nodes.text: Star Tours Flight 1138 was the designation of a Star Tours travel agency flight to Chandrila and Coruscant the morning of the Raid at Spaceport THX1138. It was on time and set to arrive at the spaceport's Gate 2B at 0815 hours. It was scheduled to depart again at 0910.
"1138" is one of many references in Star Wars media to the George Lucas film THX-1138.
